physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed hypertrophic and infiltrating nodules of varying sizes with significant scratches and local exudation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The symptoms improved over time with reported alleviation of itching and decline in rash by the first revisit (4 weeks after treatment initiation). By the fourth revisit (16 weeks after treatment), the rash was almost imperceptible and pruritus was no longer prominent.
